rabbits.name: Light Tan Domestic Rabbit
rabbits.description: A young, domestic rabbit with soft, dense light tan or beige fur. Standing upright in a grassy outdoor setting with an alert and curious expression. Has large, round, dark eyes with a slight glint, small pink nose, and short upright ears. Creamy white fur visible on belly, chest, and front paws.

characteristics.coat: Soft, dense light tan or beige fur with creamy white underbelly
characteristics.eye_color: Large, round, dark eyes with slight glint
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Light tan coat, creamy white underbelly, short upright ears

housing.outdoor_access: Supervised outdoor time in secure area
housing.bedding: Soft hay, paper bedding, or fleece
housing.temperature: Keep in 60-70°F range, avoid extreme heat

nutrition.water: Fresh water available 24/7 in heavy bowl or bottle

health.dental_care: Unlimited hay for natural tooth wear
health.exercise: Minimum 4 hours daily exercise outside cage

environment.cage_cleaning: Spot clean daily, full clean weekly
environment.litter_box: Provide litter box with paper-based litter
environment.socialization: Gentle handling, avoid picking up by ears

grooming.bathing: Rarely needed, spot clean if necessary

rabbits.image_description: Light tan domestic rabbit standing in grassy outdoor setting

rabbits.name: Tan and Cream Rabbit in Arms
rabbits.description: A small, fluffy rabbit with soft, dense fur in shades of light brown, tan, and cream. Being held gently by a person, showing a calm and curious expression. Large, dark, glossy eyes, light tan ears, and prominent white whiskers extending from cheeks. Cream-colored fur around muzzle and chin.

characteristics.coat: Soft, dense fur in light brown, tan, and cream
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Tan and cream coat, prominent white whiskers, calm demeanor

housing.outdoor_access: Supervised outdoor time in secure area
housing.bedding: Soft hay, paper bedding, or fleece
housing.temperature: Keep in 60-70°F range, avoid extreme heat

nutrition.water: Fresh water available 24/7 in heavy bowl or bottle

health.dental_care: Unlimited hay for natural tooth wear
health.exercise: Minimum 4 hours daily exercise outside cage

environment.cage_cleaning: Spot clean daily, full clean weekly
environment.litter_box: Provide litter box with paper-based litter
environment.socialization: Gentle handling, avoid picking up by ears

grooming.bathing: Rarely needed, spot clean if necessary

rabbits.image_description: Tan and cream rabbit being held gently by person

rabbits.name: Cuddling Lop Rabbits
rabbits.description: Two small, fluffy lop-eared rabbits cuddling closely on a textured fabric surface. Top rabbit is light brown/tan with some white fur, bottom rabbit is mostly white with light brown/tan patches on face and ears. Both have characteristic floppy (lop) ears and appear relaxed and affectionate.

characteristics.coat: Top rabbit: light brown/tan with white, Bottom rabbit: white with brown patches
characteristics.eye_color: Dark eyes visible on top rabbit
characteristics.temperament: Affectionate, bonded pair, calm and relaxed
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Lop ears, cuddling behavior, dwarf size

housing.indoor_setup: Large cage or pen (minimum 6x4 feet for pair)
housing.outdoor_access: Supervised outdoor time in secure area
housing.bedding: Soft hay, paper bedding, or fleece
housing.temperature: Keep in 60-70°F range, avoid extreme heat

nutrition.pellets: 1/4 cup high-quality rabbit pellets daily per rabbit
nutrition.vegetables: 1-2 cups fresh vegetables daily per rabbit
nutrition.water: Fresh water available 24/7 in heavy bowl or bottle

health.dental_care: Unlimited hay for natural tooth wear
health.exercise: Minimum 4 hours daily exercise outside cage

environment.cage_cleaning: Spot clean daily, full clean weekly
environment.litter_box: Provide litter box with paper-based litter
environment.socialization: Gentle handling, avoid picking up by ears

grooming.bathing: Rarely needed, spot clean if necessary

rabbits.image_description: Two lop-eared rabbits cuddling on textured fabric surface

rabbits.name: White Rabbit in Blue Vest
rabbits.description: A white rabbit with soft, fluffy fur standing upright on hind legs inside a white wire cage. Wearing a light blue vest/harness covering chest and back. Has prominent upright ears, long whiskers, and light-colored eyes (possibly blue or grey). Small pink nose with curious expression.

characteristics.distinguishing_features: White coat, blue vest/harness, upright ears

housing.outdoor_access: Supervised outdoor time in secure area
housing.bedding: Soft hay, paper bedding, or fleece
housing.temperature: Keep in 60-70°F range, avoid extreme heat

special_care.harness_training: Ensure harness fits properly and is comfortable
special_care.cage_requirements: Adequate space for standing and movement

rabbits.image_description: White rabbit in blue vest standing in wire cage outdoors

rabbits.name: Yawning White Rabbit
rabbits.description: A small, fluffy white rabbit lying down on light brown carpet with front paws extended forward. Mouth wide open revealing pink interior and small tongue, possibly yawning or vocalizing. Large, round, glossy black eyes, long white whiskers, and one upright ear with soft pink interior visible.

characteristics.distinguishing_features: White coat, expressive face, yawning behavior

housing.outdoor_access: Supervised outdoor time in secure area
housing.bedding: Soft hay, paper bedding, or fleece
housing.temperature: Keep in 60-70°F range, avoid extreme heat

environment.socialization: Gentle handling, avoid picking up by ears

rabbits.name: Young Tan Rabbit in Carrier
rabbits.description: A very young, light brown or tan dwarf rabbit standing upright on hind legs within a light-colored fabric carrier. Small size with soft, fluffy fur, large dark round eyes, small pinkish nose, and long white whiskers. Semi-floppy ears matching body color. Blue and white striped trim on carrier.

characteristics.coat: Soft, fluffy light brown or tan fur with cream underbelly
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Young age, dwarf size, semi-floppy ears
